title: Wombat Game Tools 0.1 is out, please play with it!
content:
Read the readme, you'll find interesting tidbits like:

"Duke Nukem 2 sprites draw very slowly, I will fix this ASAP"

Things added in the last day:

- .snd player, plays natively through your sound card!
- figured out compression on fullscreen GateWorld images.

Full list of games, see readme.htm for full progress:

Cannon Fodder, Clyde 1, Clyde 2, Captain Comic 1, Cosmo, Crystal Caves, Duke Nukem 1, Duke Nukem 2, Dune 2,
GateWorld, Hocus Pocus (full registered only), Major Stryker, Monster Bash, ScubaVenture, Maths Rescue, Word Rescure, Secret Agent, Wacky Wheels, Pixel Painter games, Unknown EGA image (a little unstable), Unknown VGA (a little unstable)

Get it [url=http://www.gamers-pit.com/szevvy/wombat_0.1.zip]here![/url]

------------------------------------------------------Support (at least partially) for 17 games!
Check out the progress of Wombat Game Tools [url=http://student.ci.qut.edu.au/~n4738667/progress.htm]here[/url]
